positive_examples: This is an example of spirit.
We observed spirit in this context.
A typical case of spirit would involve these features.
The concept of spirit applies here.
A non-corporeal divine or supernatural entity with conscious existence.
negative_examples: This is an example of angel, not spirit.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Angel, or other types of Deity

definition: A non-corporeal supernatural being or the immaterial essence of a person.
